mapper.sql: id, name, factory_number, company_sku, platform_sku, asin, fnsku, customs_code, factory_finished_goods_inventory, Kilogram, along, width, height, inner_box_area, nh_quantity, wx_quantity, box_long, box_width, box_height, box_heavy, delete_flag, image, remark, product_cost, tenant_id,brand,category_id
mapper.select:
select * FROM jsh_material where 1=1
and name like '%${name}%'
and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1' order by id desc

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from jsh_material
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into jsh_material (id, name, factory_number, company_sku, platform_sku, asin, fnsku, customs_code, factory_finished_goods_inventory, Kilogram, along, width, height, inner_box_area, nh_quantity, wx_quantity, box_long, box_width, box_height, box_heavy, delete_flag, image, remark, product_cost, tenant_id,brand,category_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companySku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformSku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fnsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryFinishedGoodsInventory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kilogram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{along,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerBoxArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nhQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxLong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxWidth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxHeavy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),#{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),#{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
